intro.name: Avik Bhattacharjya
intro.summary: With 7 years of hands-on experience in web development, I specialize in crafting modern, responsive websites and dynamic web applications. My journey spans diverse industries, where I’ve delivered innovative solutions using the latest technologies. I’m passionate about turning ideas into seamless digital experiences that delight users and drive results.

experiences.description: Led a comprehensive UI redesign and built a modular component library, delivering pixel-perfect, accessible interfaces with faster load times, improved developer productivity, and higher user engagement.

Spearheaded a UI revamp and built a reusable component library for customer-facing products, delivering pixel-perfect, accessible interfaces and faster load times while collaborating closely with designers and backend teams.

Led development of responsive, accessible UI components and marketing/e‑commerce pages, delivering pixel‑perfect implementations and improved performance. Built and maintained UI automation suites (Cypress/Selenium) and integration tests to catch regressions early, streamline releases, and reduce manual QA effort.
